content.raw:
This is a good place to point out that until zprocess 3, you have to explicitly disable insecure connections in addition to specifying the `shared_secret`in labconfig to enable encryption:

```
[security]
allow_insecure = False
shared_secret=<path to shared secret file>
```

i.e. the existence of a shared\_secret value in labconfig doesn’t stop the server being started in insecure mode.
content.html:
This is a good place to point out that until zprocess 3, you have to explicitly disable insecure connections in addition to specifying the shared_secretin labconfig to enable encryption:

[security]
allow_insecure = False
shared_secret=<path to shared secret file>

i.e. the existence of a shared_secret value in labconfig doesn’t stop the server being started in insecure mode.
